name: The Last Cheesehunter
description:
Help tiger to hunt cheese and help pink elephant to fly!
Save the world and all the cheese in this jump'n' run adventure!
Throw exploding cheese and find the old master of cheese!
Fly to the big cheese in the sky and fight against the mad central computer!

Also available under: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ch.CanisLupus.TheLastCheesehunter
